# Templates for Source File Headers

`java`

```
/* 
* Copyright 2018-2023 contributors to the Marquez project
* SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0
*/
```

`bash`

```   
#!/bin/bash
#
# Copyright 2018-2023 contributors to the Marquez project
# SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0
```

`py`

```
# Copyright 2018-2023 contributors to the Marquez project
# SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0
```

`rust`

```
// Copyright 2018-2023 contributors to the OpenLineage project
// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0
```

----
SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0\
Copyright 2018-2023 contributors to the OpenLineage project
